import React, { useState } from 'react' const PopupCard = ({ visible, setVisible, country }) => { console.log(country) let RenderedCurrency if (country.length !== 0) { console.log(true) } return (

More About the Country

{country.name}

Native Name:

{country.nativeName}

Population:

{country.population}

Region:

{country.region}

{country.subregion}

Capital:

{country.capital}

{country.topLevelDomain}

Currencies:

{RenderedCurrency}

Languges:

{}

) } export default PopupCard
